metadata.name: GENESIS_FLS #001.1
metadata.description:
GENESIS_FLS #001.1 is the first Fastlove Studios NFT. It is a virtual ticket that gives direct access to collectively build actions and projects and craft together the path of Fastlove Studios.

Holding this GENESIS_FLS #001.1 gives you a life-lasting membership offering you many other perks and utilities, such as:

- VOICE & VOTE
Direct dialogue and participation in decision-making processes

- EXPERIENCES
Events, giveaways, meetings, gamification, metaverse exploration and much more

- DISCOUNTS & AIRDROPS
Discounts and airdrops of products and upcoming projects

- PRODUCTS
Access to exclusive products and early access to drops

- EXCLUSIVE CONTENT
Articles, interviews, courses, newsletters and much more

FASTLOVE STUDIOS
Join us at https://fastlovestudios.com/nft 
      

      Metadata JSON:
